title: Question 17:
description: How many BOND tokens are allocated to the “Liquidity Pool Incentivization” program for distribution to staked token providers?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: This initiative will be granted 20% (2,000,000 $BOND tokens) and each epoch will have 20,000 $BOND tokens to start. The Liquidity Pool Incentivization initiative will run for 100 weeks and each epoch will last 1 week. At the end of the epoch the user can harvest their $BOND.
